cwn_entry.cwn_title: flyer available for the OCaml MOOC, course starts Sep 26
cwn_entry.cwn_what:
The second iteration of the online course "Introduction to Functional Programming in OCaml", aka the OCaml MOOC, starts in a little more than two weeks, on September 26th.
English and french subtitles are available, and we use a one of a kind exercise environment fully embedded in the browser that got outstanding reviews in the first run of this course.
There are already more than 1600 registered to learn OCaml with this MOOC, and we believe it would be beneficial to our community to attract as many newcomers as possible, so we have prepared more material to help spread widely the word.
- a one page flyer that you can print, post, and share
https://t.co/ROCoSeTc4R
- an announcement for newcomers can be found at the end of this message
